text: A proverb is a wise saying. Many cultures have collections of these, such as the Book of Proverbs in the Old Testament, was said to be written by king Solomon of Israel. A proverb is basically a wise saying. ==Examples of proverbs== English proverbs are short, traditional sayings that offer advice or convey a basic truth. They are widely used in everyday conversation and writing. Learning these proverbs not only helps in understanding English culture and communication but also provides insights into common wisdom and practical advice. ==References== ==Related pages== *Aphorism Category:Cultural anthropology Category:Literature Category:Oral tradition Category:Phrases
